name: logging
desc: A flexible and extensible structured logging library for Dart and Flutter.

name: AnsiColor
desc: A utility class to apply ANSI terminal color codes to strings.

name: AnsiColor.bg
desc: A utility class to apply ANSI terminal color codes to strings.

name: AnsiColor.fg
desc: A utility class to apply ANSI terminal color codes to strings.

name: AnsiColor.new
desc: A utility class to apply ANSI terminal color codes to strings.

name: AnsiColor.none
desc: A utility class to apply ANSI terminal color codes to strings.

name: BG_BLACK
desc: Background: Standard black (ANSI code 0).

name: BG_BLUE
desc: Background: Standard blue (ANSI code 4).

name: BG_BRIGHT_BLACK
desc: Background: Bright black (dark gray, ANSI code 8).

name: BG_BRIGHT_BLUE
desc: Background: Bright blue (ANSI code 12).

name: BG_BRIGHT_CYAN
desc: Background: Bright cyan (ANSI code 14).

name: BG_BRIGHT_GREEN
desc: Background: Bright green (ANSI code 10).

name: BG_BRIGHT_MAGENTA
desc: Background: Bright magenta (ANSI code 13).

name: BG_BRIGHT_RED
desc: Background: Bright red (ANSI code 9).

name: BG_BRIGHT_WHITE
desc: Background: Bright white (ANSI code 15).

name: BG_BRIGHT_YELLOW
desc: Background: Bright yellow (ANSI code 11).

name: BG_CYAN
desc: Background: Standard cyan (ANSI code 6).

name: BG_GREEN
desc: Background: Standard green (ANSI code 2).

name: BG_MAGENTA
desc: Background: Standard magenta (ANSI code 5).

name: BG_RED
desc: Background: Standard red (ANSI code 1).

name: BG_WHITE
desc: Background: Standard white (ANSI code 7).

name: BG_YELLOW
desc: Background: Standard yellow (ANSI code 3).

name: BLACK
desc: Foreground: Standard black (ANSI code 0).

name: BLUE
desc: Foreground: Bright blue (ANSI code 12).

name: CYAN
desc: Foreground: Bright cyan (ANSI code 14).

name: DARK_BLUE
desc: Foreground: Standard blue (ANSI code 4).

name: DARK_CYAN
desc: Foreground: Standard cyan (ANSI code 6).

name: DARK_GRAY
desc: Foreground: Bright black (dark gray, ANSI code 8).

name: DARK_GREEN
desc: Foreground: Standard green (ANSI code 2).

name: DARK_MAGENTA
desc: Foreground: Standard magenta (ANSI code 5).

name: DARK_RED
desc: Foreground: Standard red (ANSI code 1).

name: DARK_YELLOW
desc: Foreground: Standard yellow (ANSI code 3).

name: GRAY
desc: Foreground: Standard white (ANSI code 7).

name: GREEN
desc: Foreground: Bright green (ANSI code 10).

name: MAGENTA
desc: Foreground: Bright magenta (ANSI code 13).

name: RED
desc: Foreground: Bright red (ANSI code 9).

name: WHITE
desc: Foreground: Bright white (ANSI code 15).

name: YELLOW
desc: Foreground: Bright yellow (ANSI code 11).

name: ansiDefault
desc: ANSI sequence to reset all styles, colors, and attributes to default.

name: ansiEsc
desc: The ANSI escape sequence introducer. Signals the terminal that a control sequence follows.

name: bg
desc: Background color, represented by a 256-color ANSI code.

name: call
desc: Applies the ANSI color codes to the provided msg and resets formatting after.

name: color
desc: Whether colorization is enabled.

name: fg
desc: Foreground color (text color), represented by a 256-color ANSI code.

name: grey
desc: Computes a grey shade ANSI color code based on a normalized level from 0.0 to 1.0.

name: resetBackground
desc: ANSI escape sequence to reset the background color to default.

name: resetForeground
desc: ANSI escape sequence to reset the foreground color to default.

name: toBg
desc: Converts this instance to a background-only AnsiColor using the foreground color.

name: toFg
desc: Converts this instance to a foreground-only AnsiColor using the background color.

name: toString
desc: Returns the ANSI escape code string that applies this color configuration.

name: AnsiOutput
desc: A utility class for formatting terminal output using ANSI colors and background styles.

name: apply
desc: Applies a foreground color to the given text.

name: blue
desc: Foreground: bright blue.

name: cyan
desc: Foreground: bright cyan.

name: darkGreen
desc: Foreground: dark green.

name: darkRed
desc: Foreground: dark red.

name: gray
desc: Foreground: gray (mapped to white).

name: green
desc: Foreground: bright green.

name: magenta
desc: Foreground: bright magenta.

name: onBackground
desc: Applies a background color and optional foreground to the given text.

name: onRed
desc: Shorthand for white text on bright red background.

name: onYellow
desc: Shorthand for black text on bright yellow background.

name: red
desc: Foreground: bright red.

name: white
desc: Foreground: bright white.

name: yellow
desc: Foreground: bright yellow.

name: JetLeafLoggingListener
desc: A default implementation of LoggingListener that outputs logs to the console.

name: JetLeafLoggingListener.new
desc: A default implementation of LoggingListener that outputs logs to the console.

name: Log
desc: A convenient logging utility built on top of LogFactory.

name: Log.new
desc: A convenient logging utility built on top of LogFactory.

name: debug
desc: Logs a message at the DEBUG level.

name: error
desc: Logs a message at the ERROR level.

name: fatal
desc: Logs a message at the FATAL level.

name: info
desc: Logs a message at the INFO level.

name: trace
desc: Logs a message at the TRACE level.

name: warn
desc: Logs a message at the WARN level.

name: LogConfig
desc: Configuration class that controls the appearance and content of log output.

name: LogConfig.new
desc: Creates a new LogConfig with custom display options.

name: showDateOnly
desc: Whether to show only the date portion of the timestamp.

name: showEmoji
desc: Whether to include emojis representing the log level (e.g., ðŸŸ¢, ðŸ”´).

name: showLevel
desc: Whether to include the log level (e.g., INFO, ERROR) in the output.

name: showLocation
desc: Whether to show the location of the log call (e.g., file/line).

name: showTag
desc: Whether to include the logger name or tag in the output.

name: showThread
desc: Whether to include the thread or isolate identifier.

name: showTimeOnly
desc: Whether to show only the time portion of the timestamp.

name: showTimestamp
desc: Whether to show the full timestamp (date and time) in the log output.

name: steps
desc: The ordered list of log steps that define how a log message is composed.

name: useHumanReadableTime
desc:
Whether to display timestamps in a human-readable format
(e.g., Jun 23, 2025 14:58:22) instead of ISO 8601.

name: LogContent
desc: The log content.

name: LogEntry
desc: The log entry.

name: LogFactory
desc: A base class for building structured logging mechanisms within Jet-based applications.

name: LogFactory.new
desc: Constructs the logger factory with the given tag.

name: add
desc: Adds a message to the log buffer under the specified level.

name: addAll
desc: Adds all logs from the given entry to the internal super entry buffer.

name: canPublish
desc: Whether the logger can publish logs to the console.

name: clear
desc: Clears all logs from every LogLevel.

name: entry
desc: Returns the log entry for the current logger.

name: getError
desc: Returns the error from the given content.

name: getIsAllowed
desc: Whether the logger is allowed to publish logs to the console.

name: getIsDebugEnabled
desc: Returns whether DEBUG-level logging is currently enabled.

name: getIsErrorEnabled
desc: Returns whether ERROR-level logging is currently enabled.

name: getIsFatalEnabled
desc: Returns whether FATAL-level logging is currently enabled.

name: getIsInfoEnabled
desc: Returns whether INFO-level logging is currently enabled.

name: getIsTraceEnabled
desc: Returns whether TRACE-level logging is currently enabled.

name: getIsWarnEnabled
desc: Returns whether WARN-level logging is currently enabled.

name: getLog
desc: Returns a new Log instance for the given type.

name: getMessage
desc: Returns the message from the given content.

name: getStackTrace
desc: Returns the stack trace from the given content.

name: logListener
desc: The LogListener to use for this factory.

name: publish
desc: Publishes all logs to the console.

name: setIsAllowed
desc: Sets whether logging is allowed globally.

name: setIsDebugEnabled
desc: Enables or disables DEBUG-level logging.

name: setIsErrorEnabled
desc: Enables or disables ERROR-level logging.

name: setIsFatalEnabled
desc: Enables or disables FATAL-level logging.

name: setIsInfoEnabled
desc: Enables or disables INFO-level logging.

name: setIsTraceEnabled
desc: Enables or disables TRACE-level logging.

name: setIsWarnEnabled
desc: Enables or disables WARN-level logging.

name: tag
desc: A custom label or category used to identify the logger instance.

name: LogLevel
desc: Defines various levels of logging severity for controlling logging output.

name: fromValue
desc: Returns the log level from the given value.

name: isEnabledFor
desc: Determines if this log level is enabled given a minimum level.

name: name
desc: The display name of the log level (e.g., 'INFO', 'ERROR').

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: value
desc: Integer value for comparing levels. Lower values mean lower severity.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: LogPrinter
desc: A base class for implementing custom log output formatting.

name: extractStack
desc: Extracts the stack trace from a LogRecord.

name: getStepValue
desc: Extracts the string representation of the given LogStep from a LogRecord.

name: levelColor
desc: Returns the color for the given log level.

name: log
desc: Formats the given LogRecord into a list of strings.

name: stringify
desc: Converts a message to its string representation.

name: LogStep
desc: Defines individual components (steps) that can be included in log output.

name: defaultSteps
desc: Default ordering and selection of log steps used by printers unless overridden.

name: fromValue
desc: Converts a string value to its corresponding LogStep.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: LogType
desc: Specifies the overall formatting strategy used for log output.

name: fromString
desc: Returns the LogType corresponding to the given name.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Logger
desc: A flexible and extensible logging interface.

name: Logger.new
desc: A flexible and extensible logging interface.

name: addListener
desc: Replaces the current LoggingListener with a custom implementation.

name: debug
desc: Logs a message with LogLevel.DEBUG.

name: error
desc: Logs a message with LogLevel.ERROR.

name: fatal
desc: Logs a message with LogLevel.FATAL.

name: info
desc: Logs a message with LogLevel.INFO.

name: listener
desc: The current log listener responsible for handling the log output logic.

name: log
desc: Logs a message with a specified log level.

name: trace
desc: Logs a message with LogLevel.TRACE.

name: warn
desc: Logs a message with LogLevel.WARN.

name: LoggingListener
desc: A listener interface for reacting to logging events within an application.

name: onLog
desc: Called when a new log entry is emitted by a logger.

name: console
desc: Global singleton logger instance for convenience.

name: printers
desc: This library provides a set of log printers that can be used to format log records into a string representation.

name: FlatPrinter
desc: A simple, flat-style log printer that outputs log records in a structured format.

name: FlatPrinter.new
desc: A simple, flat-style log printer that outputs log records in a structured format.

name: config
desc: Configuration object that determines which log steps to include.

name: getStepValue
desc: Extracts the string representation of the given LogStep from a LogRecord.

name: log
desc: Formats the given LogRecord into a list of strings.

name: FlatStructuredPrinter
desc: A structured log printer that formats log records with optional indentation and stack traces.

name: FlatStructuredPrinter.new
desc: A structured log printer that formats log records with optional indentation and stack traces.

name: config
desc: Configuration for customizing the log output format.

name: excludePaths
desc: List of paths to exclude from stack traces

name: getStepValue
desc: Extracts the string representation of the given LogStep from a LogRecord.

name: log
desc: Formats the given LogRecord into a list of strings.

desc: A log printer that outputs logs in logfmt format.

desc: A log printer that outputs logs in logfmt format.

name: config
desc: Configuration for customizing which log components are included.

name: getStepValue
desc: Extracts the string representation of the given LogStep from a LogRecord.

name: log
desc: Formats the given LogRecord into a list of strings.

name: HybridPrinter
desc: A hybrid log printer that delegates printing based on log level.

name: HybridPrinter.new
desc: A hybrid log printer that delegates printing based on log level.

name: log
desc: Formats the given LogRecord into a list of strings.

name: PrefixPrinter
desc: A customizable log printer that prepends a prefix to each log line.

name: PrefixPrinter.new
desc: A customizable log printer that prepends a prefix to each log line.

name: config
desc: Configuration object that controls what log components are included.

name: getStepValue
desc: Extracts the string representation of the given LogStep from a LogRecord.

name: log
desc: Formats the given LogRecord into a list of strings.

name: PrettyPrinter
desc: A visually styled log printer that wraps log output in a clean box format.

name: config
desc: Configuration for the printer

name: errorMethodCount
desc: Number of stack trace lines to show for error logs

name: excludePaths
desc: List of paths to exclude from stack traces

name: getStepValue
desc: Extracts the string representation of the given LogStep from a LogRecord.

name: lineLength
desc: Maximum line length for the log output

name: log
desc: Formats the given LogRecord into a list of strings.

name: methodCount
desc: Number of stack trace lines to show for normal logs

name: stackTraceBeginIndex
desc: Index to start from in the stack trace

name: PrettyStructuredPrinter
desc: A structured and visually aligned log printer designed for clear readability.

name: PrettyStructuredPrinter.new
desc: A structured and visually aligned log printer designed for clear readability.

name: config
desc: Configuration controlling visibility and format.

name: excludePaths
desc: Exclude paths from the stack trace.

name: getStepValue
desc: Extracts the string representation of the given LogStep from a LogRecord.

name: lineLength
desc: Total character width for the border line.

name: log
desc: Formats the given LogRecord into a list of strings.

name: SimplePrinter
desc: Simple printer that outputs basic, compact log messages in a single line.

desc:
Logging configuration that controls formatting details like
